Status: Draft
Updated: YYYY-MM-DD

## Purpose
What this runbook accomplishes and when to use it.

## Preconditions
- Access/roles required
- Environments supported (local/stage/prod)
- Dependencies/secrets/config files

## Steps
1) Prep – commands to set context, fetch configs, or validate inputs.  
2) Execute – ordered commands or actions with expected outputs.  
3) Validate – how to confirm success (queries, logs, UI checks).  
4) Rollback – steps to undo or mitigate if something fails.  
5) Notes – edge cases, known issues, time limits.
